hadiths.text: An-Nu'man bin Bashir said:"I am the most knowledgeable among the people about the prescribed time of this prayer: Allah's Messenger would pray it when the moon set on the third (of the month)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وَقْتِ صَلاَةِ الْعِشَاءِ الآخِرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Time For The Last Isha Prayer
